/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image presents a tranquil scene of a tree-lined street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The trees, tall and lush with green leaves, stand on either side of the street, their branches reaching out as if to touch each other. The sky above is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds that add a sense of depth to the image.

The street itself is a narrow dirt path, its earthy brown color contrasting beautifully with the vibrant green of the trees. On the right side of the street, a small patch of grass can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.

The perspective of the image is from a low angle, looking up at the towering trees and the expansive sky. This angle gives a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene, making the viewer feel as if they are standing right there on the street, looking up at the sky.

Overall, the image captures a peaceful moment on a tree-lined street, under a clear blue sky, evoking a sense of calm and serenity. It's a snapshot of nature coexisting with urban life, a testament to the beauty that can be found in everyday scenes.
